original_title: Buoyed by the Irrelevance of Their Own Insignificance
overview: Animals all-at-sea; a cowâ€™s head struggling to make for shore, an owl floundering in the surf or a reindeer awash in the breakers. Buoys of poetic improbability bobbing up and down in a sea of city-life normality.
title: Buoyed by the Irrelevance of Their Own Insignificance
